author: John Ferrara
comment: Like the selection also like the sweeping second hand. Would be nice to be able to change the watch hands and mix and match the backgrounds. Other than that...like I said nice selection.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi  John ,We are glad that you like our watch face ,we will covering these things in future update ,stay in touch with us ,thank you for your time

title: Clean and nice designs

author: Damian Glaze
comment: Not for all Android watches. I wish they would list a definitive list of the android watches they support. Buyer beware.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Damian,We are very much sorry that our watch face not meet your expectation,We have mentioned that The watch Faces is not for all the smart watches but only android wear watches paired with android phone(4.3+),so pls reconsider your rating or send us an email to wearables@insideglobe.com ,we are happy to assist you ,Thank you for your time

title: Not sure about this..

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Would prefer it to be a single face with settings to change it. Right now I either have to hide each face I don't want or scroll through 8 extra faces on my watch. Should just be a single face with 8 settings.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Arik ,We will consider your ideas in our next update and fix it soon ,Thank you for the time
